name: Yummy Tubes
description:
A game about a goo created from toxic waste who must collect test tubes to survive. Created for the Weekly Game Jam 29.

Each color has a different effect, but they all restore some of your health. The red heals the most.

Controls: 

Left mouse click/ Left CTRL: Consume chemical.

Right mouse click/Left ALT: Store chemical in hideout.

Spacebar: Jump.

***There is a known bug in levels 2 and 3 where you are told you have one more extra tube available than there really is, so be careful.***

This was my first entry in the Weekly Game Jam, and the first time I share a game with anyone. Any criticism welcome!
